import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { compose } from 'redux' import { firestoreConnect } from 'react-redux-firebase' import NotificationList from './NotificationList' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import MobileNavbar from '../layout/MobileNavbar' const Notification = ({ notifications, auth, profile }) => { return(
home
Notifications
) } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { console.log(state) return { notifications: state.firestore.ordered.notifications, auth: state.firebase.auth, profile: state.firebase.profile } } export default compose( firestoreConnect([ { collection: 'notifications', orderBy: ['time', 'desc'] } ]), connect(mapStateToProps) )(Notification)
